comments.body: Merit! Merit!! Merit!!! Here we go again with another one. If you understand the indepth of what this means you will understand why you need to work for everything you may deserve from the forum.Anything outside the forum's rules and regulations is void and null.Quote from: Zele365 on March 14, 2023, 12:56:22 PMtry to help others and the results will come.Try help yourself first.Quote from: Zele365 on March 14, 2023, 12:56:22 PMWhat will 1000 merit you if you didn't deserve any, you shouldn't be greedy, it didn't bring anyone anything good in life.Maybe you don't know, having upto a thousand or more merits shows hiw serious, active and being committed you have been on this forum and the more you keep getting signifies that you maintain such steadfast.

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: Zele365 on March 14, 2023, 12:56:22 PMImagine what this forum would be like if we could all buy metrics, or send them to each other in excessive amounts, be there, be good, help others and it will come back to you double.I guess your question is how will the forum be of merits can be bought and used at will.  I don't wish to be in a forum where advancement will be based on financial strength. If merits can be bought, only the rich in the forum will be able to acquire them. Ranking will now be based on financial strength and not on the knowledge (merit) and time (activity) of members. If such a rule is introduced this forum will lose its value because many high-ranking members will lack the requisite knowledge and experience because most of them might be newbies that can afford to buy merit. If you produce quality posts you will gradually increase in rank and in the process, you will keep learning and unlearning. You don't need worry about merits because it will naturally. You also need to be aware that buying or selling of merit is an offense in this forum. Hence you have to perish every thought of merit buying or selling.
